# TimeHelper.ToTimeSpan method

Converts value expresed in minutes into a new TimeSpan.

```csharp
public static TimeSpan ToTimeSpan(int minutes)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| minutes | The value expresed in minutes. |

## Return Value

A TimeSpan that represents input value expresed in minutes.
